name: Spawn of Hriggala
description: The Spawn of Hriggala is a huge fiend with a chaotic evil nature, characterized by its high physical strength and formidable presence in battle.
memorable: It can reduce a target's hit point maximum with its necrotic tendril attack, potentially leading to instant death.
goals: To cause havoc on the battlefield and summon undead to assist in combat.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other fiends or undead creatures due to its abilities.
environment: Typically found in dark, subterranean areas or places associated with necromantic energy.
strengths: Possesses natural armor and immunities to necrotic and poison damage, making it a resilient adversary.
weaknesses: Low intelligence, wisdom, and charisma scores limit its effectiveness in social situations.
attacks: Uses a Multiattack that includes a powerful bite and tendril strikes, the latter of which can reduce hit point maximums.
most_powerful_ability: Escape the Material allows it to open a portal to the plane of the undead, potentially bringing forth additional threats.
senses: It has blindsight and tremorsense, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without relying on sight.
additional_information: Magic Resistance gives it advantage on saving throws against spells
The Tunneler ability allows it to create tunnels through solid rock
High strength score enhances its physical attacks
Resistance to various elemental damage types enhances survivability
Grapples targets with its bite attack, rendering them restrained
test_queries: chaotic evil fiend with high strength
fiend that can burrow through rock
